name: NSTableView.GridLineStyle
desc: NSTableView defines these constants to specify grid styles. These constants are used by the gridStyleMask property. The mask can be either gridNone or it can contain either or both of the other options combined using the C bitwise OR operator.

items.name: static var solidVerticalGridLineMask: NSTableView.GridLineStyle
items.desc: Specifies that vertical grid lines should be displayed.

items.name: static var solidHorizontalGridLineMask: NSTableView.GridLineStyle
items.desc: Specifies that horizontal grid lines should be displayed.

items.name: static var dashedHorizontalGridLineMask: NSTableView.GridLineStyle
items.desc: Specifies that the horizontal grid lines should be drawn dashed.
